title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1244.11 - Application of charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1244.11 - Application of charges

State Regulations
(a) Wharf
demurrage will be charged on inbound cargo remaining after the expiration of
free time. (b) Wharf demurrage will
be charged on outbound cargo remaining after the vessel leaves the berth, as
well as on cargo arriving before the free time commences. (c) Wharf demurrage will be charged for

Saturdays, Sundays, and holidays before or after the free time
period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1244.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
